org.apache.jmeter.timers

接口 Timer

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    所有已知子接口:
    ModifiableTimer
    所有已知实现类:
    BeanShellTimer, BSFTimer, ConstantThroughputTimer, ConstantTimer, GaussianRandomTimer, JSR223Timer, PoissonRandomTimer, PreciseThroughputTimer, RandomTimer, SyncTimer, UniformRandomTimer

    public interface Timer
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface defines those methods that must be implemented by timer plugins.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      long delay()
      This method is called after a sampling process is done to know how much time the sampling thread has to wait until sampling again.
      default boolean isModifiable() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • delay

        long delay()
        This method is called after a sampling process is done to know how much time the sampling thread has to wait until sampling again.
        返回:
        the computed delay value.

      • isModifiable

        default boolean isModifiable()
        返回:
        true if factor can be applied to it
